title: Computer Lab Assistant (Elementary)
status: Part Time, 27.5 hours per weekMinimum Requirements:Associate's degreeor48 semester hours from an accredited college/universityorpassing results on an approved Paraprofessional Assessment.Experience using various computer platforms, office suite software, Internet browsers, and other computer related equipment, including scanners, burners, and printers preferred, but not required.The salary for this position is assigned to Level 3 of the SC Salary Schedule.To view the salary schedule, please select the following linkSC Salary Schedule.Attachment(s):Computer Lab Assistant, Elementary.pdfEmail To A FriendPrint Version
